name: goober
content:
goober noun [C]
(NUT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also goober pea) a small, oval seed that grows underground in pairs inside a thin brown shell: The term "goober" derives from an African word for the peanut. Some southern farmers had their own goober patch, where they grew a supply of peanuts sufficient for their families' use throughout the year. Synonym
peanut
More examplesFewer examplesIn summer, roadside shacks start popping up everywhere, ready to ladle out steaming cups of goober peas to anyone with a few bucks.

goober noun [C]
(PERSON)
a silly person: People were standing there watching, calling him a goober and all sorts of things. I feel like such a goober!
More examplesFewer examplesOK I'm a goober, I cannot get this thing to work.
